title: Saved by Monsters
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B09MRJDR2CThe Mothman, the Minotaur, and the Sandman walk into a human sacrifice… and instead of killing me, they saved me.Now I find myself a member of a brand new organization, one I never knew existed: the Occult House. Monsters, summoners, and the rare human (me) rub elbows in this spooky mansion.A trio of monsters has brought me here, and despite their glowing eyes, giant horns, and supernatural powers, I find them intriguing. Tempting. Seductive.I should go.But I have to stay. As it turns out, I have the soul of an ancient deity within me: Medusa.If I try to go home to my family, I’ll kill them all with a single gaze.I’ve become a monster, just like the three of them.And I’m beginning not to mind it…Saved by Monsters is the first in an extra long, extra juicy series about monsterous men and the woman who loves them. Cryptid lovers everywhere will love this heart-pounding novel!
author: Lucy Auburn
